description: This dashboard provides trust anchor and repository statistics

panels.description:
RDP status code : 0 = Success, 10 = Error in socket I/O, 35 = Timeout waiting for daemon connection
Rsync status code : 200 = OK, 304 = Not Modified, 503 = Service Unavailable
panels.title: Connection Status

targets.legendFormat: Total Time to Fetch Data + Cryptographic Validation

panels.title: Total Validation Run Duration vs. RRDP or Rsync Update Time of Each Repo
rsync exit code (0 = Success, 10 = Error in socket I/O, 35 = Timeout waiting for daemon connection)
RRDP exit code (200 = Success, -1 = Cannot Connect)

title: Routinator
